methods.name: SimpleNotification
methods.description: Creates a simple notification with title and subtitle, capable of displaying large texts in the subtitle.

methods.name: LargeIconNotification
methods.description: Displays a large icon in the notification with title and subtitle.

methods.name: BigPictureNotification
methods.description: Creates a notification with a big picture and in addition it is possible to add title, subtitle and large icon.

methods.name: ActionNotification
methods.description: With this block it is possible to create up to three action buttons in the notification and in addition, it is possible to add as a "hyperlink".

methods.name: PlayMusicNotification
methods.description: Displays notification of MediaStyle with pause button.

methods.name: ProgressNotification
methods.description: Create a notification with a progress bar.

methods.name: PauseMusicNotification
methods.description: Displays notification of MediaStyle with play button.

methods.name: ReceiverMessageNotification
methods.description: Through this block, you can show a notification of a received message with the ability to reply in the bar itself.

methods.name: ConfirmSendingMessage
methods.description: If the user responds to the message in the notification, it will show a loading icon until that block is used.

methods.name: GetFavorite
methods.description: Gets whether the song is marked as a favorite.

methods.name: ClearAllMessage
methods.description: When calling the MessageReceiverNotification method, it stores the added messages and to remove, use this method.

name: NotificationStyle
helpString: Extension component for NotificationStyle. Created using Rush.

events.name: PermissionResult
events.description: When the user grants / denies notification permission

events.name: CallbackButtonAction
events.description: When clicking on any action button, the name of the respective button will be returned by that block.

events.name: CallbackMusicPlayer
events.description: When clicking on any button of the media style notification, the name of the Action is returned in this block.

events.name: CallbackMessage
events.description: Return of the message typed in the notification.

events.name: CallbackButtonProgress
events.description: Returns the name of the action button pressed in the progress notification.
